line_1: " And fierce on me th' infernal poison preys. "
line_2: "Before her spells young ARNO'S bloom decays,

line_1: A cank'rous Venom on the Vitals preys,
line_2: And poisons all the Comforts of his Days.

line_1: Know on his peace this dire misfortune preys,
line_2: And will, we dread, cut short his valu'd days.

line_1: And think, how soon insatiate death, who preys
line_2: Which one chaste bed did to my father raise;
Destin'd to pass my joyless Days,

line_1: When sorrow on the writer's quiet preys;
line_2: Devours the substance of the less'ning bayes.

line_1: To crown your Shame, the Beggar IRUS preys
line_2: Upon your Sheep, and all the fattest slays:

line_1: But man, curst man on turkey preys,
line_2: And Christmas shortens all our days;

line_1: And upon ship-wreck'd faith, and sinking virtue preys?
line_2: Whence are these torrents then, these billowy seas

line_1: And upon ship-wreck'd faith, and sinking virtue preys?
